name: Apotheosis (Sodma)
description:
This game is a tool to restore a world inside a theoretical MIND.

You will meet Wadjet, the ruler of this place. Guide him to his metaphor of a throne, and help him reunite with his family. As you progress you will learn more about the fate of this "kingdom". And I can assure you...You are the only one who can change it.
Sometimes consequences are there, even if you think you didn't do anything.
It's a demo-version. Full game is still in progress.
